Turbase

own your data

Turbase keeps your data on your device.  You share data through secure blockchains.  Applications access data directly on the device without storing it themselves.  Turbase puts you in control of what you share and with whom.

Turbase works though Beyond Decentralized techology. 

LEARN MORE

Turbase has a full-blown server on each device it runs on. It intelligently ensures data security even when data from multiple organizations is being processed. Turbase hierarchically structures data based on rules specified by organizations or user groups.

Turbase data can be shared with discretion across only the intended users, even when those users belong to different organizations.

learn more

Blockchain secured data sharing

Turbase splits data into repositories.  Each repository is shared ​independently of others and has its own private blockchain.  Private data is encrypted and signed by the member users and the device Turbase runs on. This ensures that every change is performed by a verified user on a verified device.

learn more

Stay tuned

Turbase and AIRport are under development. Checkout the progress on Github or visit the blog for what's happening now.

LEARN MORE
